hed: A Modern Manhattan Home for a Hollywood Power Couple
dek: Designer Alexandra Angle plots a lively modern look for the Manhattan townhouse of Hollywood talent manager Jason Weinberg, screenwriter Merritt Johnson, and their two young sons

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-01-slideshow.jpg
items.caption: Hollywood talent manager Jason Weinberg at the New York City townhouse he shares with screenwriter Merritt Johnson and their twin sons. The spaces were conceived by [Alexandra Angle Interior Design](http://www.alexandraangle.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-02.jpg
items.caption: Hanging in the living area are images by various photographers, including Vivian Maier, Ralph Eugene Meatyard, Bruce Davidson, and actress Jessica Lange, one of Weinberg’s clients and friends.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-03.jpg
items.caption: A [Flos](http://usa.flos.com/) floor lamp reaches over the living area’s sectional sofa, which is upholstered in a [Larsen](http://www.cowtan.com/) velvet; the club chairs are by [Christian Liaigre](http://www.christian-liaigre.us/en/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-04.jpg
items.caption: The artworks by the staircase are by Madeleine Farley.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-05.jpg
items.caption: A [Ted Abramczyk](http://www.abramczykstudio.com/) light fixture from [Ralph Pucci International](http://www.ralphpucci.net/) hangs above the dining table, which is paired with chairs cushioned in a [Manuel Canovas](http://www.cowtan.com/) fabric; a [Calvin Klein Home](http://www.calvinklein.com/shop/en/ck/home-decor-collection) bowl sits atop a 1960s [Raymond Loewy](http://www.raymondloewy.com/) credenza, and the bookcases were designed by [Alexandra Angle](http://www.alexandraangle.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-06.jpg
items.caption: In the kitchen, [Mod Made](http://www.modmade.com/) barstools match vintage kitchenware once owned by Johnson’s great-grandmother; the hood, cooktop, and oven are by [Gaggenau](http://www.gaggenau.com/us/), and the sink fittings are by [Kohler](http://www.us.kohler.com/us/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-07.jpg
items.caption: A [Martin Parr](http://www.martinparr.com/) photograph makes a colorful splash above the dining area’s [Maxine Snider](http://www.maxinesniderinc.com/) console.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-08.jpg
items.caption: Weinberg’s office is furnished with a [Christian Liaigre](http://www.christian-liaigre.us/en/) sofa and a vintage Omann Jun Møbelfabrik desk from [Emmerson Troop](http://emmersontroop.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-09.jpg
items.caption: The roof terrace features plantings devised by [Halsted Welles Assoc](http://halstedwelles.com/).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-10.jpg
items.caption: The ceiling of the twins’ playroom is sheathed in a [Flavor Paper](https://www.flavorpaper.com/) wallpaper; vintage campaign desks flank a vintage overscale [Anglepoise](https://www.anglepoise.com/) floor lamp, and the watercolor on the right is by filmmaker Tim Burton.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-11.jpg
items.caption: In the master bath, the sinks and sink fittings are by [Lacava](http://www.lacava.com/), the tiles are by [Heath Ceramics](http://www.heathceramics.com/), and the medicine cabinets are by [Robern](http://www.robern.com/home.rbn).

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-12.jpg
items.caption: The master suite was designed to evoke a modern hotel vibe.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-13.jpg
items.caption: An [Alexandra Hedison](http://www.hedison.com/) photograph presides over the master bedroom.

items.title: dam-images-decor-2015-10-leading-role-alexandra-angle-designed-johnson-weinberg-manhattan-home-14.jpg
items.caption: The guest room is brightened by a series of [Roger Gastman](http://www.rogergastman.com/) prints; the orange table lamp is by [Artemide](http://www.artemide.us/), and the lamp with the brass shade is by [Tom Dixon](http://www.tomdixon.net/us/).
